reviews.review:
Gra jest bardzo krótka, pierwsze przejście zajeło mi 45 min., ale można to zrobić w 20-25 minut. Jest to właściwie fragment misji, ponieważ nawet nie cała, i nie wnosi ona nic nowego do całkowitej fabuły gry. Mimo to gra się bardzo przyjemnie i miodnie:-)). Oczywiśće, jak zawsze w Half-Life, trzeba troszeczkę pomyśleć, nie tylko strzelać. Jest to chyba najładniejsza z "cześci" Half-Lifa pod względem graficznym. Mam tu na myśl nie tyle jakość grafiki - choć ta jest bardzo dobra, ale piekno lokacji, w której poruszamy się. Po raz kolejny wychodzimy na zewnątrz z mrocznych korytarzy i gramy w pięknym prawosławnym klasztorze nad brzegiem morza. 

Podsumowując: polecam zagrać! Trudno to ocenić w punktach, ale gra jest fajna i godna poświęcanei 0,5 godz. czasu. POLECAM !

P.S. Polecam grać na najwyższym poziomie trudności, jest naprawdę trudno :-))
Great game! Plays on high specs on my mac mini!
Мне очень понравилось, я соглашусь с разработчиками что надо выпускать к каждой игре такое обновление.

It has become outdated now as it was intended to be a demo for HL2. It's a nice script on the history of the development of HL2, but treating it as any more than that is pushing it. Play it if it comes with your game, but if for some reason you are put in a situation where you have to buy it, don't.
Very short

A very quick and short lost part of half-life 2 that filled with 14 commentary from the developers include gabe newell about how they design and develope game like half-life 2. 

You as Gorden that will do a little bit of combat some exploring and then one small easy puzzle to destory a big gun that's been shelling the nearby village. Shouldn't take more then 10 minutes to complete but it's quite fun to hear developer talking about everything. 

10/10... Try it out hear what Valve staff have to say. I just wish they will make more games.

Pros:
- It's a Half Life "lost-episode", it's still Half Life- can't go wrong!
- Adds some attributes to Gmod.
- Still looks amazing for being MORE than 10 years old now.
- You can run graphical benchmarks to see if your outdated pci x4 card still works as good as when you bought it.
- You can run graphical benchmarks to see if your updated Ti or Rx card can laugh at how fast it can cap at 300fps.
- Crowbar!

Cons:
- Game is more than 10 years old now, and is lost in the coast of HL3 dreams. (Pun)
- People like me make stupid puns about it being lost in a coast.
- Half Life 3 was delayed 15 years because Gabe Newell lost the files off the coast of the ocean.
- More terrible puns made about the name, and HL3 release dates.

Overall: Download it, play it, then cry when you finish it and realise there's nothing more after this. Likely won't be for ages to come. GREAT EPISODE THOUGH!
shows how good vaulve can get with game making. it also comes free with any HL2 purches's so yay.:-D

[h1] Ничего сверхъестественного[/h1]
Этот обзор выйдет кратким, так как в игре особо нечего описывать. Геймплей ничем отличается от HL2, Сюжет простенький (Взорвать установки для ракет с хэдкрабами и уничтожить вертолет), Это просто не более чем технодемка для демонстрации динамического освещения. Как демка проходится максимум за 7-10 минут зависимости от прямоты рук.
[h1] Очевидный факт:[/h1]
Изначально хотели сделать как часть главы "Шоссе 17"
[h1] Оценка 8 из 10[/h1]
剧情略短

[b]Half-Life 2: Lost Coast[/b] является вырезанным когда-то уровнем из Half-life 2. Позже, как мы видим, из него сделали демку нового на тот момент HDR-освещения. В принципе, это всё что можно сказать о нём. Проходится буквально за 15 минут, но Valve даже здесь умудрились сделать всё на высшем уровне.

СЛОГАН:"Оцени возможность движка"СЮЖЕТ: Гордон Фримен должен отбить атаку "Комбайнов" на морском утёсе...   ИГРОВОЙ МИР: закрытый, линейный...   ПРОТАГОНИСТ: Гордон Фримен...   КАМЕРА: от 1-ого лица...   СЕТЬ: одиночная...   ГРАФИКА: 10 из 10.   ГЕЙМПЛЕЙ: 10 из 10.   ОПТИМИЗАЦИЯ: 10 из 10.   ЦЕНА: дорогая.   ПРИМЕЧАНИЕ: это не полноценная игра, а один уровень показывающий возможности движка...   ИТОГ: Рекомендую!

Would definitely reccommend. If you're not aware, it's a chapter of Half-Life 2 that was released late and did not get included into the campaign. It really completes the HL2 experience. The level is very pretty, same great writing, enemies, and level design as the rest of the game.
A nice tech demo showing some of Valve's design process for their games.
It was a very interesting experience just play yet another HL2 Level and to know more about their design process.

If you expect this to be a sidekick to Half-Life 2 like opposing force or blue shift were to Half-Life, you'll be disappointed. It is just one Level that was not featured in Half-Life 2 and instead was used as a demonstration of the new High Dynamic Range lightning feature of the Source-engine. This is done quite well with a nice commentary that explanes the different methods that were used. 
It's a good tec-demo and should be played with commentary.
Отличное дополнение для итак отличной игры без коментариев

흥미로움

Yukarıda da yazdığı gibi,Half Life 2'nin '17.Otoyol' adlı bölümünde bulunan bir 'Balıkçı Kasabası''dır 'Lost Coast'. 

Oyunda bulunmama nedenleri ise:

 1-)Oyunun hikayesinin gereğinden fazla uzun olup (Şu anki hali bile oldukça uzun bir de HL2 Beta'daki tüm map'lerin de eklendiğini düşünsenize...) oyuncuları  sıkacağının düşünülmesi. 

2-)Oyunun çıkış tarihine tam olarak yetişememesi (aslında diğer Map'ler de yetişememişti.)

3-)Oyunun-o zaman için-kapladığı disk boyutunun aşırı yüksek olması. 



Sonradan çıkan Steam sürümünde görülen ana konu ise: 

'Freeman,yolculuğu sırasında bir Balıkçı Kasabası'na ulaşır.'
Kasabanın başında bulunan küçük iskele/limanda yaşlı bir adam balık tutmaktadır. Balıkçı,sizden:

"Combine'ları durdurmanızı böylece kasaba halkının rahat bir nefes alacağını söyler. Combine'ların,attıkları Scanner'ların sesini duyan balıkçı size füzeleri de durdurmanizi ister ve füzelerin atıldığı yerin kasaba merkezindeki kilisenin içinde olduğu bilgisini verir." 

Böylece siz kiliseye gidersiniz.O sırada çevreyi Combine'lar sarar.Onları yener ve makineyi durdurursunuz.
Aşağı yukarı oyun bundan ibaret,Lost Coast içinde barındırdığı su,duvar,insan,silah vs. texture leriyle HL2 için bir demodur âdeta...

Keşke diğer mapler için de aynı şekilde bir mini oyun tarzı bir ek paket yayınlasa Valve.

Ve küçük te bir uyarı:Suya girmeyin.Suda tıpkı HL2 de olduğu gibi Leech lerle dolu!!!

A short, extra level for HL2, this game takes place in a beach, where we fought Combine soliders and a helicopter at the end. My favorite part of this particular deleted stage is that we can easily throw enemies down the cliff into the water, which is ultimately satisfying. This game would be better if it was longer, with perhaps the addition of aquatic enemies, such as the Ichtyosaur.
hcbdkccd
It's just like Half Life 2, but shorter. Still good.
Nice little demo of what the Source Engine is capable of.

A nice little extra for Half-Life 2. *Note that this is not an add-on or expansion like episodes 1 & 2. It is basically a 30 minute area which was cut from the game. It comes with developer commentary and is free so there is no reason not to have a look! 7/10
A tech-demo that manages to be fun and cohesive. Wow!
Its always so exciting to see a new installment of mr... i mean...DR. Freemens adventures.
единственная халфа, которую я прошёл быстрее всех 😎

For what i know this game is intended to showcase the new graphic effect for the Source engine and yes this game is really short, it will take you about under 30 minutes (I acctually finish this In under 15 minutes), but still this demo Is still fun to play despite the length of the game plus I always use this demo to test some skins and mods for HL2 that available on internet.

Finally do I recommend this demo?... I guess so, If you think 30 minutes or less can satisfy you then go for it.

Plus this game Is free to download when you purchase a copy of HL2.
Очень было интересно послушать как говорят разработчики Half-life 2 и почитать как делалась игра :)
